at_least_one_digital_field.zh_CN: 至少需要一个数字字段作为维度，才能渲染漏斗图
at_least_one_digital_field.en_US: At least one digital field is required as a dimension to render the funnel map

select_one_or_multi_fields.zh_CN: 请选择一个或多个维度
select_one_or_multi_fields.en_US: Please select one or more dimensions

select_one_or_multi_records.zh_CN: 请选择一个或多个记录
select_one_or_multi_records.en_US: Please select one or more records

unlock_tips.zh_CN: 取消锁定后，当前漏斗图仅在本地渲染
unlock_tips.en_US: After the lock is canceled, the current funnel map is only rendered locally

lock_tips.zh_CN: 开启锁定后，当前漏斗图将固定下来，不再跟随鼠标移动或切换记录而更新图形
lock_tips.en_US: After opening the lock, the current funnel map will be fixed, no longer follow the mouse to move or switch records and update the graphic

max_dimensions_tips.zh_CN: 最多只能添加 10 个维度
max_dimensions_tips.en_US: Only 10 dimensions can be added at most
